Name: Disallow public sharing of Amazon Machine Images (AMIs)
Description: This control prevents the public sharing of your AMIs by configuring block public access for AMIs at an account level. If you already have public AMIs, they remain publicly available.

Name: Checks if Amazon CloudWatch Evidently segments have tags
Description: Checks if Amazon CloudWatch Evidently segments have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys.  The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Checks if AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) endpoints for Redis data stores are enabled for TLS/SSL encryption of data communicated with other endpoints
Description: Checks if AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) endpoints for Redis data stores are enabled for TLS/SSL encryption of data communicated with other endpoints. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if TLS/SSL encryption is not enabled.

Name: Checks if Amazon CloudWatch alarms actions are in enabled state
Description: Checks if Amazon CloudWatch alarms actions are in enabled state. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the CloudWatch alarms actions are not in enabled state.

Name: Enable integrity validation for CloudTrail log file
Description: Protect the integrity of account activity logs using AWS CloudTrail log file validation, which creates a digitally signed digest file that contains a hash of each log that CloudTrail writes to Amazon S3.

Name: Disallow delete actions on S3 buckets without MFA
Description: Protect your S3 buckets by requiring multi-factor authentication (MFA) for delete actions. MFA adds an extra authentication code on top of a user name and password.

Name: Stateless network firewall rule group should not be empty
Description: This control checks if a Stateless Network Firewall Rule Group contains rules. The rule will fail if there are no rules in a Stateless Network Firewall Rule Group.

Name: Checks if S3 buckets have default encryption enabled or have bucket policies that explicitly deny put-object requests without server side encryption using AES-256 or AWS KMS
Description: Checks if S3 buckets have default encryption enabled or have bucket policies that explicitly deny put-object requests without server side encryption using AES-256 or AWS KMS. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an S3 bucket is not encrypted by default.

Name: Unused IAM user credentials should be removed
Description: This control checks whether your IAM users have passwords or active access keys that were not used within the previous 90 days.

Name: DynamoDB tables should automatically scale capacity with demand
Description: This control checks whether a DynamoDB table can scale its read or write capacity as needed. This control passes if the table uses an on-demand capacity mode or if the table uses provisioned mode with automatic scaling configured.

Name: Require that an Amazon Redshift cluster parameter group is configured to use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) for encryption of data in transit
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Redshift cluster parameter group is configured to require encryption by means of Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), for data in transit.

Name: Require an Amazon RDS database cluster to copy tags to snapshots
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon RDS DB cluster is configured to copy all tags to snapshots created.

Name: CloudTrail log file validation should be enabled
Description: This AWS control checks whether CloudTrail log file validation is enabled.

Name: Connections to OpenSearch domains should be encrypted using the latest TLS security policy
Description: This controls checks whether connections to an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain are using the latest TLS security policy. The control fails if the OpenSearch domain isn't using the latest supported policy or if HTTPS isn't enabled.

Name: Checks if non-default security groups are attached to elastic network interfaces
Description: Checks if non-default security groups are attached to elastic network interfaces. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the security group is not associated with a network interface.

Name: Require that an Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR) security configuration is configured to encrypt data at rest in Amazon S3 with an AWS KMS key
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon EMR security configuration is configured to encrypt EMR File System (EMRFS) objects at rest in Amazon S3 with an AWS KMS key.

Name: Require an AWS AppSync GraphQL API cache to have encryption in transit enabled.
Description: This control checks whether an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption in transit enabled.

Name: Checks whether a WAF Global Web ACL contains any WAF rules or rule groups
Description: Checks whether a WAF Global Web ACL contains any WAF rules or rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rule or rule group.

Name: Checks if DNS query logging is enabled for your Amazon Route 53 public hosted zones
Description: Checks if DNS query logging is enabled for your Amazon Route 53 public hosted zones. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if DNS query logging is not enabled for your Amazon Route 53 public hosted zones.

Name: Checks if your CloudFormation stacks send event notifications to an Amazon SNS topic
Description: Checks if your CloudFormation stacks send event notifications to an Amazon SNS topic. Optionally checks if specified Amazon SNS topics are used. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if CloudFormation stacks do not send notifications.

Name: Checks if running Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instances are launched using amazon key pairs
Description: Checks if running Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instances are launched using amazon key pairs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a running EC2 instance is launched with a key pair.

Name: Secrets Manager secrets configured with automatic rotation should rotate successfully
Description: This control checks whether an AWS Secrets Manager secret rotated successfully based on the rotation schedule. The control fails if RotationOccurringAsScheduled is false. The control does not evaluate secrets that do not have rotation configured.

Name: Require an AWS CloudTrail trail to have encryption at rest activated
Description: This control checks whether your AWS CloudTrail is configured to use the server-side encryption (SSE) AWS KMS key encryption.

Name: Deny access to AWS based on the requested AWS Region for the landing zone
Description: Disallows access to unlisted operations in global and regional services outside of the specified Regions for the landing zone.

Name: Amazon Redshift clusters should have audit logging enabled
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Redshift cluster has audit logging enabled.

Name: Amazon EFS volumes should be in backup plans
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) file systems are added to the backup plans in AWS Backup. The control fails if EFS file systems are not included in the backup plans.

Name: Checks if an AWS CloudTrail multi-Region trail is enabled and logs all read S3 data events for your buckets
Description: Checks if an AWS CloudTrail multi-Region trail is enabled and logs all read S3 data events for your buckets. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no multi-Region trail logs all read S3 data event types for all current and future S3 buckets.

Name: EBS default encryption should be enabled
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) encryption is enabled by default. The control fails if EBS default encryption is not enabled.

Name: OpenSearch domains should encrypt data sent between nodes
Description: This control checks whether Amazon OpenSearch domains have node-to-node encryption enabled. This control fails if node-to-node encryption is disabled on the domain.

Name: Require an Amazon ElastiCache (Redis OSS) replication group to have encryption in transit activated
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon ElastiCache (Redis OSS) replication group has encryption-in-transit enabled.

Name: Classic Load Balancers should have cross-zone load balancing enabled
Description: This control checks whether cross-zone load balancing is enabled for Classic Load Balancers. This control fails if cross-zone load balancing is not enabled for a Classic Load Balancer.

Name: Amazon Redshift clusters should not use the default Admin username
Description: This control checks whether a Redshift cluster has changed the Admin username from its default value. This control will fail if the admin username for a Redshift cluster is set to 'awsuser'.

Name: Checks if AWS Security Hub is enabled for an AWS Account
Description: Checks if AWS Security Hub is enabled for an AWS Account. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if AWS Security Hub is not enabled.

Name: Require Amazon ECR repositories to have a lifecycle policy configured
Description: This control checks whether a private Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR) repository has at least one lifecycle policy configured.

Name: Require all requests to Amazon S3 resources use authentication based on an Authorization header
Description: This control disallows requests to your Amazon S3 resources that use an authentication method other than HTTP 'Authorization' header-based authentication (presigned URL or HTTP POST requests).

Name: Require that an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user does not have an inline or managed policy attached attached
Description: This control checks whether your AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user has inline or managed (AWS and customer) policies directly attached. Instead, IAM users should inherit permissions from IAM groups or roles.

Name: Users should not have root access to SageMaker notebook instances
Description: This control checks whether root access is turned off for Amazon SageMaker notebook instances. The control fails if root access is turned on for a SageMaker notebook instance.

Name: Amazon SageMaker notebook instances should not have direct internet access
Description: This AWS control checks whether direct internet access is disabled for an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance by examining the DirectInternetAccess field is disabled for an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance.

Name: EC2 instances managed by Systems Manager should have a patch compliance status of COMPLIANT after a patch installation
Description: This AWS control checks whether the compliance status of the Amazon EC2 Systems Manager patch compliance is COMPLIANT or NON_COMPLIANT after the patch installation on the instance. It only checks instances that are managed by AWS Systems Manager Patch Manager.

Name: An RDS event notifications subscription should be configured for critical cluster events
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon RDS Event subscription for RDS clusters is configured to notify on event categories of both "maintenance" and "failure".

Name: Checks if an account with Amazon EMR has block public access settings enabled
Description: Checks if an account with Amazon EMR has block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if BlockPublicSecurityGroupRules is false, or if true, ports other than Port 22 are listed in PermittedPublicSecurityGroupRuleRanges.

Name: Checks if CloudFront distributions are using deprecated SSL protocols for HTTPS communication between CloudFront edge locations and custom origins
Description: Checks if CloudFront distributions are using deprecated SSL protocols for HTTPS communication between CloudFront edge locations and custom origins. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a CloudFront distribution if any ‘OriginSslProtocols’ includes ‘SSLv3’.

Name: Disallow modification of an AWS Backup report plan that AWS Control Tower manages
Description: This control limits changes to the AWS Backup report plan that AWS Control Tower manages.

Name: OpenSearch domains should be in a VPC
Description: This control checks Amazon OpenSearch Service domains are in an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC).

Name: Checks if an EC2 instance has an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) profile attached to it
Description: Checks if an EC2 instance has an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) profile attached to it. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no IAM profile is attached to the EC2 instance.

Name: Disallow cross-region networking for Amazon EC2, Amazon CloudFront, and AWS Global Accelerator
Description: Disallow cross-region networking connections from Amazon EC2, Amazon CloudFront, and AWS Global Accelerator services.

Name: Application, Network and Gateway Load Balancers should span multiple Availability Zones
Description: This control checks whether an Elastic Load Balancer V2 (Application, Network, or Gateway Load Balancer) has registered instances from multiple Availability Zones. The control fails if an Elastic Load Balancer V2 has instances registered in less than 2 Availability Zones.

Name: GuardDuty should be enabled
Description: This AWS control checks whether Amazon GuardDuty is enabled in your AWS account and region.

Name: Elasticsearch domains should encrypt data sent between nodes
Description: This control checks whether Elasticsearch domains have node-to-node encryption enabled.

Name: Checks if Amazon Inspector V2 ECR scanning is activated for your single or multi-account environment to detect potential software vulnerabilities in your container images
Description: Checks if Amazon Inspector V2 ECR scanning is activated for your single or multi-account environment to detect potential software vulnerabilities in your container images. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if ECR scanning is not activated.

Name: Require Amazon EFS access points to have a root directory
Description: This control checks whether your Amazon EFS access points are configured to enforce a root directory.

Name: Checks if your Amazon CloudFront distributions use HTTPS (directly or via a redirection)
Description: Checks if your Amazon CloudFront distributions use HTTPS (directly or via a redirection). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the value of ViewerProtocolPolicy is set to 'allow-all' for the DefaultCacheBehavior or for the CacheBehaviors.

Name: Require that an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) inline policy does not have a statement that includes "*" in the Action and Resource elements
Description: This control checks that AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) inline policies do not include "Effect": "Allow" with "Action": "*" over "Resource": "*".

Name: Require that application and network load balancer access logging is activated
Description: This control checks whether your ELB application and network load balancers have logging activated.

Name: VPC flow logging should be enabled in all VPCs
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Virtual Private Cloud flow logs are found and enabled for Amazon VPCs. The traffic type is set to 'Reject'.

Name: Checks that Amazon Redshift automated snapshots are enabled for clusters
Description: Checks that Amazon Redshift automated snapshots are enabled for clusters.

Name: Require an Amazon API Gateway REST domain to use a security policy that specifies a minimum TLS protocol version of TLSv1.2
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon API Gateway REST API domain name requires a minimum Transport Layer Security protocol version of TLSv1.2 by means of its security policy.

Name: Require an AWS AppSync GraphQL API to be configured with private visibility
Description: This control checks whether an AWS AppSync GraphQL API has been configured with private visibility.

Name: Require an Amazon API Gateway V2 stage to have access logging activated
Description: This control checks whether Amazon API Gateway V2 stages have access logging enabled. Access logging is supported for HTTP and WebSocket APIs.

Name: Require any AWS KMS key to have rotation configured
Description: This control checks whether key rotation is enabled for AWS KMS customer-managed keys.

Name: Disallow inbound and outbound internet connections to your VPCs through an internet gateway (IGW) or egress-only internet gateway (EIGW)
Description: This control blocks direct ingress and egress traffic from the internet to your VPCs through an IGW or EIGW, by configuring block public access for VPCs (VPC BPA) at an account level. This control also disallows configuration of any VPC BPA exclusions, which means that if you enable it, you cannot exclude VPCs or subnets from the effects of this control.

Name: Checks if an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption in transit enabled
Description: Checks if an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption in transit enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'TransitEncryptionEnabled' is false.

Name: Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group should cover multiple Availability Zones
Description: This control checks whether an Auto Scaling group spans multiple Availability Zones. The control fails if an Auto Scaling group does not span multiple availability zones.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 instance to have detailed monitoring enabled
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon EC2 instance has detailed monitoring enabled.

Name: Require an Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (MSK) cluster to enforce encryption in transit between cluster broker nodes
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon MSK cluster is configured to encrypt data in transit between broker nodes of the cluster.

Name: Connections to Elasticsearch domains should be encrypted using the latest TLS security policy
Description: This controls checks whether connections to an Elasticsearch domain are using the latest TLS security policy. The control fails if the Elasticsearch domain isn't using the latest supported policy or if HTTPS isn't enabled.

Name: Checks the number of network hops that the metadata token can travel
Description: Checks the number of network hops that the metadata token can travel. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Metadata response hop limit is greater than 1.

Name: EFS access points should enforce a root directory
Description: This control checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) access points are configured to enforce a root directory. This control fails if the value of 'Path' is set to '/' (default root directory of the file system).

Name: Detect whether public IP addresses for Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling are enabled through launch configurations
Description: Detects whether Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling groups have public IP addresses enabled through launch configurations. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the launch configuration for an Auto Scaling group has the value of the field AssociatePublicIpAddress set as True.

Name: IAM policies should not allow full "*" administrative privileges
Description: This AWS control checks whether the default version of AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies (also known as customer managed policies) do not have administrator access with a statement that has "Effect": "Allow" with "Action": "*" over "Resource": "*". It only checks for the Customer Managed Policies that you created, but not inline and AWS Managed Policies.

Name: Require an Elasticsearch domain to encrypt data sent between nodes
Description: This control checks whether Elasticsearch domains have node-to-node encryption enabled.

Name: Hardware MFA should be enabled for the root user
Description: This AWS control checks whether your AWS account is enabled to use a hardware multi-factor authentication (MFA) device to sign in with root user credentials.

Name: Application Load Balancer should be configured to redirect all HTTP requests to HTTPS
Description: This AWS control checks whether HTTP to HTTPS redirection is configured on all HTTP listeners of Application Load Balancers. The control will fail if one or more HTTP listeners of Application Load Balancers do not have HTTP to HTTPS redirection configured.

Name: DynamoDB tables should have point-in-time recovery enabled
Description: This control checks whether point-in-time recovery (PITR) is enabled for a DynamoDB table.

Name: Lambda function policies should prohibit public access
Description: This control checks whether the AWS Lambda function policy attached to the Lambda resource prohibits public access. If the Lambda function policy allows public access, the control fails.

Name: Checks if the Amazon FSx for Lustre file systems are configured to copy tags to backups
Description: Checks if the Amazon FSx for Lustre file systems are configured to copy tags to backups. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if Lustre file systems are not configured to copy tags to backups.

Name: Disallow cross region replication for S3 buckets
Description: Contain the location of your S3 data to a single region by disabling any automatic, asynchronous copying of objects across buckets to other AWS Regions.

Name: Checks if Amazon Fraud Detector variables have tags
Description: Checks if Amazon Fraud Detector variables have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: RDS DB Instances should prohibit public access, as determined by the PubliclyAccessible configuration
Description: This AWS control checks whether RDS instances are publicly accessible by evaluating the publiclyAccessible field in the instance configuration item.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group to use only AWS Nitro instance types when overriding a launch template
Description: This control checks whether, when using a MixedInstancesPolicy resource parameter override, an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group overrides launch templates by specifying AWS Nitro instance types only.

Name: Checks if the Lambda function is configured with a function-level concurrent execution limit
Description: Checks if the Lambda function is configured with a function-level concurrent execution limit. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Lambda function is not configured with a function-level concurrent execution limit.

Name: Detect whether an account has AWS CloudTrail or CloudTrail Lake enabled.
Description: Detects whether an account has AWS CloudTrail or CloudTrail Lake enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if either CloudTrail or CloudTrail Lake is not enabled in an account.

Name: Require an Amazon RDS database cluster to have encryption at rest configured
Description: This control checks whether the storage encryption is configured on Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) database (DB) clusters that are not being restored from an existing cluster.

Name: OpenSearch domains should have fine-grained access control enabled
Description: This control checks whether Amazon OpenSearch domains have fine-grained access control enabled. This control fails if the fine-grained access control is not enabled.

Name: Checks if an Amazon Neptune cluster is configured with Amazon RDS Multi-AZ replication
Description: Checks if an Amazon Neptune cluster is configured with Amazon RDS Multi-AZ replication. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if Multi-AZ replication is not enabled.

Name: Checks if an Amazon SQL Server DB instance is configured to publish logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs
Description: Checks if an Amazon SQL Server DB instance is configured to publish logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the DB instance is not configured to publish logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Name: EC2 instances should be managed by AWS Systems Manager
Description: This AWS control checks whether the Amazon EC2 instances in your account are managed by AWS Systems Manager.

Name: Checks if Amazon DynamoDB tables are protected by a backup plan
Description: Checks if Amazon DynamoDB tables are protected by a backup plan. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the DynamoDB Table is not covered by a backup plan.

Name: Neptune DB clusters should publish audit logs to CloudWatch Logs
Description: This control checks whether a Neptune DB cluster publishes audit logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The control fails if a Neptune DB cluster doesn't publish audit logs to CloudWatch Logs. `EnableCloudWatchLogsExport` should be set to Audit.

Name: Require that AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) inline policies do not have wildcard service actions
Description: This control checks whether AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) inline policies do not include "Effect": "Allow" with "Action": "Service:*" (e.g. s3:*) for individual AWS services or use the combination of "NotAction" with an "Effect" of "Allow".

Name: Set a retention policy for log archive
Description: Limit data retention in the log archive using a retention policy that defaults to 365 days.

Name: Checks if logging is enabled on AWS WAF classic global web access control lists (web ACLs)
Description: Checks if logging is enabled on AWS WAF classic global web access control lists (web ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a global web ACL, if it does not have logging enabled.

Name: Checks if AWS Storage Gateway volumes are in a logically air-gapped vault
Description: Checks if AWS Storage Gateway volumes are in a logically air-gapped vault. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an AWS Storage Gateway volume is not in a logically air-gapped vault within the specified time period.

Name: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instances
Description: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instances. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon EC2 instance does not have a corresponding recovery point created within the specified time period.

Name: Require an Amazon RDS database instance to have encryption at rest configured
Description: This control checks whether storage encryption is enabled for your Amazon RDS database (DB) instance.

Name: Redshift clusters should use enhanced VPC routing
Description: This control checks whether a Redshift cluster has EnhancedVpcRouting enabled.

Name: Network ACLs should not allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22 or port 3389
Description: This control checks whether a network access control list (NACL) allows unrestricted access to the default ports for SSH/RDP ingress traffic. The rule fails if a NACL inbound entry allows a source CIDR block of '0.0.0.0/0' or '::/0' for ports 22 or 3389

Name: Checks if the deployment group for Lambda Compute Platform is not using the default deployment configuration
Description: Checks if the deployment group for Lambda Compute Platform is not using the default deployment configuration. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the deployment group is using the deployment configuration 'CodeDeployDefault.LambdaAllAtOnce'.

Name: Require any Amazon ELB application or network load balancer to have an AWS Certificate Manager certificate
Description: This control checks whether your Amazon Elastic Load Balancing (ELB) application and network load balancers use certificates provided by AWS Certificate Manager (ACM).

Name: Require an Amazon S3 bucket to have lifecycle policies configured
Description: This control checks whether a lifecycle rule is configured for Amazon S3 buckets.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 instance to set AssociatePublicIpAddress to false on a new network interface created by means of the NetworkInterfaces property in the AWS::EC2::Instance resource
Description: This control checks whether your Amazon EC2 instance is configured NOT to associate a public IP address by default, and it requires configuring the AssociatePublicIpAddress parameter to false on a new network interface created by means of the NetworkInterfaces property.

Name: Require that an AWS KMS customer-managed key (CMK) is configured with imported key material
Description: This control disallows creation of KMS keys that do not have a key origin of 'EXTERNAL'.

Name: Checks if an AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) replication instance has automatic minor version upgrades enabled
Description: Checks if an AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) replication instance has automatic minor version upgrades enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an AWS DMS replication instance is not configured with automatic minor version upgrades.

Name: Require an Amazon ElastiCache replication group of earlier Redis OSS versions to have Redis OSS AUTH activated
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon ElastiCache replication group with an engine version earlier than 6.0 has Redis OSS AUTH enabled.

Name: Require that a public AWS DMS replication instance is not public
Description: This control checks whether your AWS DMS replication instance is public.

Name: Checks if Amazon CloudWatch security metrics collection on AWS WAFv2 rule groups is enabled
Description: Checks if Amazon CloudWatch security metrics collection on AWS WAFv2 rule groups is enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the 'VisibilityConfig.CloudWatchMetricsEnabled' field is set to false.

Name: A WAFV2 web ACL should have at least one rule or rule group
Description: This control checks whether a WAFV2 web ACL contains at least one WAF rule or WAF rule group. The control fails if a web ACL does not contain any WAF rule or rule group.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group to have multiple Availability Zones
Description: This control checks whether your Auto Scaling group spans multiple Availability Zones.

Name: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS)
Description: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon RDS instance does not have a corresponding recovery point created within the specified time period.

Name: Require Amazon SageMaker notebook instances to be deployed within a custom Amazon VPC
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance is configured to launch within a custom Amazon VPC.

Name: Require an Amazon RDS cluster not be configured to be publicly accessible by means of the 'PubliclyAccessible' property
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon RDS database cluster is configured to be publicly accessible, or not, as determined by the setting of the PubliclyAccessible property.

Name: Checks if the Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file systems have file access auditing enabled
Description: Checks if the Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file systems have file access auditing enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the FSx for Windows File Server file systems do not have file access auditing enabled.

Name: Checks if an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) cluster is configured with logging enabled
Description: Checks if an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) cluster is configured with logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging for Amazon EKS clusters is not enabled or if logging is not enabled with the log type mentioned.

Name: Checks if the virtualization type of an EC2 instance is paravirtual
Description: Checks if the virtualization type of an EC2 instance is paravirtual. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an EC2 instance if 'virtualizationType' is set to 'paravirtual'.

Name: S3 buckets should prohibit public write access
Description: This AWS control checks whether your S3 buckets allow public write access by evaluating the Block Public Access settings, the bucket policy, and the bucket access control list (ACL).

Name: Checks if Amazon CloudFront distributions are using a custom SSL certificate and are configured to use SNI to serve HTTPS requests
Description: Checks if Amazon CloudFront distributions are using a custom SSL certificate and are configured to use SNI to serve HTTPS requests. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a custom SSL certificate is associated but the SSL support method is a dedicated IP address.

Name: Checks if you have enabled S3 Cross-Region Replication for your Amazon S3 buckets
Description: Checks if you have enabled S3 Cross-Region Replication for your Amazon S3 buckets. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no replication rules enabled for Cross-Region Replication.

Name: Checks if AWS IoT SiteWise portals have tags
Description: Checks if AWS IoT SiteWise portals have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Require that an Amazon API Gateway REST API stage has encryption at rest configured for cache data
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon API Gateway REST API stage that has caching enabled also encrypts the caches.

Name: Require an Amazon DocumentDB cluster to be encrypted at rest
Description: This control checks whether storage encryption is enabled for an Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibility) cluster.

Name: Disallow changes to Amazon CloudWatch set up by AWS Control Tower
Description: Prevent changes to Amazon CloudWatch configuration set up by AWS Control Tower to monitor your environment.

Name: CodeBuild S3 logs should be encrypted
Description: This control checks if Amazon S3 logs for an AWS CodeBuild project are encrypted. The control fails if encryption is deactivated for S3 Logs for a CodeBuild project.

Name: Checks if an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instance metadata has a specified token hop limit that is below the desired limit
Description: Checks if an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instance metadata has a specified token hop limit that is below the desired limit. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an instance if it has a hop limit value above the intended limit.

Name: EBS snapshots should not be publicly restorable
Description: This AWS control checks whether Amazon Elastic Block Store snapshots are not publicly restorable.

Name: Checks if AWS App Mesh virtual nodes have tags
Description: Checks if AWS App Mesh virtual nodes have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule to check. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Require an Amazon ElastiCache replication group of later Redis OSS versions to have RBAC authentication activated
Description: This control checks whether Amazon ElastiCache replication groups with an engine version greater than or equal to 6.0 have RBAC authentication enabled.

Name: Checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) encrypts data with AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS)
Description: Checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) encrypts data with AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a file system is not encrypted. Optionally, you can check if a file system is not encrypted with specified KMS keys.

Name: Detect whether any Amazon EC2 instance has an associated public IPv4 address
Description: Detects whether an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance has an associated public IPv4 address. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the public IP field is present in the Amazon EC2 instance configuration item. This control applies only to IPv4 addresses.

Name: S3 permissions granted to other AWS accounts in bucket policies should be restricted
Description: This control checks whether the S3 bucket policy allows sensitive bucket-level or object-level actions from a principal in another AWS account. The control fails if any of the following actions are allowed in the S3 bucket policy for a principal in another AWS account: s3:DeleteBucketPolicy, s3:PutBucketAcl, s3:PutBucketPolicy, s3:PutObjectAcl, and s3:PutEncryptionConfiguration.

Name: Require an Amazon RDS database instance to have a unique administrator username
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon RDS database has changed the adminstrator username from its default value.

Name: ECS containers should be limited to read-only access to root filesystems
Description: This control checks if ECS containers are limited to read-only access to mounted root filesystems. This control fails if the ReadonlyRootFilesystem parameter in the container definition of ECS task definitions is set to ‘false’.

Name: Checks if Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes are protected by a backup plan
Description: Checks if Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes are protected by a backup plan. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon EBS volume is not covered by a backup plan.

Name: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) File Systems
Description: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) File Systems. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon EFS File System does not have a corresponding Recovery Point created within the specified time period.

Name: Checks if the certificate associated with an Amazon CloudFront distribution is the default SSL certificate
Description: Checks if the certificate associated with an Amazon CloudFront distribution is the default SSL certificate. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution uses the default SSL certificate.

Name: Require that an Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR) security configuration is configured to encrypt data at rest in Amazon S3
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon EMR security configuration is configured to encrypt EMR File System (EMRFS) objects at rest in Amazon S3.

Name: Amazon Redshift clusters should prohibit public access
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Redshift clusters are publicly accessible. It evaluates the publiclyAccessible field in the cluster configuration item.

Name: Require an Amazon S3 bucket to have block public access settings configured
Description: This control checks whether your Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket has a bucket-level Block Public Access (BPA) configuration.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group launch configuration to configure Amazon EC2 instances for IMDSv2
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling launch configuration is configured to require the use of Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2).

Name: Checks if logging is enabled with a valid severity level for AWS DMS replication task events of a target database
Description: Checks if logging is enabled with a valid severity level for AWS DMS replication task events of a target database. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging is not enabled or replication task logging of a target database has a severity level that is not valid.

Name: Checks if Amazon Aurora DB clusters are protected by a backup plan
Description: Checks if Amazon Aurora DB clusters are protected by a backup plan. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) Database Cluster is not protected by a backup plan.

Name: Require that any Amazon EC2 security group rule does not use the source IP range 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0 for ports other than 80 and 443
Description: This control checks whether the Amazon EC2 security group rule contains the string '0.0.0.0/0' or '::/0' as a source IP range. This control is not triggered if a rule allows connection to port 80 or 443 with TCP, UDP, ICMP, or ICMPv6.

Name: Require Amazon EFS access points to enforce a user identity
Description: This control checks whether your Amazon EFS access points are configured to enforce a user identity.

Name: AWS AppSync GraphQL APIs should not be authenticated with API keys
Description: This control checks whether your application uses an API key to interact with an AWS AppSync GraphQL API. The control fails if an AWS AppSync GraphQL API is authenticated with an API key.

Name: Require an AWS Step Functions state machine to have logging activated
Description: This control checks whether an AWS Step Functions state machine has logging enabled.

Name: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS)
Description: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon EBS volume does not have a corresponding recovery point created within the specified time period.

Name: Require encryption at rest for all Amazon DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) clusters
Description: This control checks whether Amazon DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) clusters are encrypted at rest.

Name: Elasticsearch domains should have encryption at-rest enabled
Description: This AWS control checks whether Elasticsearch domains have encryption at rest configuration enabled. This check fails if the EncryptionAtRestOptions field is not enabled.

Name: Neptune DB clusters should be encrypted at rest
Description: This control checks whether a Neptune DB cluster is encrypted at rest. The control fails if a Neptune DB cluster isn't encrypted at rest.

Name: Neptune DB cluster snapshots should be encrypted at rest
Description: This control checks whether a Neptune DB cluster snapshot is encrypted at rest. The control fails if a Neptune DB cluster isn't encrypted at rest.

Name: Remove unused Secrets Manager secrets
Description: This control checks whether your secrets have been accessed within a specified number of days. The default value is 90 days. Secrets that have not been accessed even once within the number days you define, fail this check.

Name: Require that an AWS AppSync GraphQL API is not authenticated with API keys
Description: This control checks that an AWS AppSync GraphQL API has been configured with an authentication type other than API_KEY authentication.

Name: Require an Amazon DAX cluster to deploy nodes to at least three Availability Zones
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon DAX cluster is configured to deploy cluster nodes to at least three Availability Zones.

Name: Enable encryption at rest for log archive
Description: Protect the integrity of your log archive through encryption at rest using server side encryption (SSE) with KMS customer-created master keys (CMK).

Name: ElastiCache replication groups should have encryption-in-transit enabled
Description: This control checks whether ElastiCache replication groups have encryption-in-transit enabled. This control fails if encryption-in-transit is not enabled for a ElastiCache replication group.

Name: Require an Amazon ECS task definition to have a specific memory usage limit
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) task definitions have specified a memory limit for container definitions.

Name: Checks if Amazon Aurora DB clusters are in a logically air-gapped vault
Description: Checks if Amazon Aurora DB clusters are in a logically air-gapped vault. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an Amazon Aurora DB cluster is not in a logically air-gapped vault within the specified time period.

Name: RDS DB clusters should be configured for multiple Availability Zones
Description: This control checks if Amazon RDS DB clusters are configured with multiple Availability Zones.

Name: Checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) File Systems are protected by a backup plan
Description: Checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) File Systems are protected by a backup plan. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the EFS File System is not covered by a backup plan.

Name: S3 Block Public Access setting should be enabled at the bucket-level
Description: This control checks if Amazon S3 buckets have bucket level public access blocks applied. This control fails if any of the bucket level settings are set to "false" public: ignorePublicAcls, blockPublicPolicy, blockPublicAcls, restrictPublicBuckets.

Name: Disallow changes to lifecycle configuration for AWS Control Tower created Amazon S3 buckets in log archive
Description: Prevent lifecycle configuration changes to Amazon S3 buckets created by AWS Control Tower.

Name: Require an AWS Lambda function URL to use AWS IAM-based authentication
Description: Require an AWS Lambda function URL to restrict access to authenticated users by using 'AWS_IAM' based authentication.

Name: Detect whether any Amazon EMR cluster master nodes have public IP addresses
Description: Detects whether any Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR) cluster master nodes have public IP addresses. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a master node has a public IP. This control checks clusters that are in RUNNING or WAITING state.

Name: VPC Lambda functions should operate in more than one Availability Zone
Description: This control checks if Lambda has more than one Availability Zone (AZ) associated. The rule fails if only one AZ is associated with Lambda.

Name: Checks if the compliance status of the AWS Systems Manager patch compliance is COMPLIANT or NON_COMPLIANT after the patch installation on the instance
Description: Checks if the compliance status of the AWS Systems Manager patch compliance is COMPLIANT or NON_COMPLIANT after the patch installation on the instance. The rule is compliant if the field status is COMPLIANT.

Name: Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible
Description: Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible.

Name: Require an Amazon RDS database instance to export logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs by means of the EnableCloudwatchLogsExports property
Description: This control checks whether Amazon RDS instances have all available log types configured for export to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Name: Require that an Elastic Load Balancing v2 target group does not explicitly disable cross-zone load balancing
Description: This control checks whether an Elastic Load Balancing v2 target group is configured so that it does not explicitly turn off cross-zone load balancing.

Name: CloudTrail should have encryption at-rest enabled
Description: This AWS control checks whether AWS CloudTrail is configured to use the server side encryption (SSE) AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) encryption. The check will pass if the KmsKeyId is defined.

Name: Require an Amazon CloudWatch log group to be retained for at least one year
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon CloudWatch Log Group retention period is set to a value greater than or equal to 365 days.

Name: Checks if an Amazon CloudWatch LogGroup retention period is set to greater than 365 days or else a specified retention period
Description: Checks if an Amazon CloudWatch LogGroup retention period is set to greater than 365 days or else a specified retention period. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the retention period is less than MinRetentionTime, if specified, or else 365 days.

Name: Security groups should not allow unrestricted access to ports with high risk
Description: This control checks whether unrestricted incoming traffic for an Amazon EC2 security group is accessible to the specified ports [3389, 20, 23, 110, 143, 3306, 8080, 1433, 9200, 9300, 25, 445, 135, 21, 1434, 4333, 5432, 5500, 5601, 22, 3000, 5000, 8088, 8888] that are considered to be high risk. This control fails if any of the rules in a security group allow ingress traffic from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0 to those ports.

Name: Require AWS Elastic Beanstalk environments to have enhanced health reporting enabled
Description: This control checks whether AWS Elastic Beanstalk environments and configuration templates are configured for 'enhanced' health reporting.

Name: Require an Amazon DocumentDB cluster to have a backup retention period greater than or equal to seven days
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon DocumentDB cluster retention period is set to seven or more days (>=7). The default retention period is one day.

Name: Checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) File Systems are in a logically air-gapped vault
Description: Checks if Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) File Systems are in a logically air-gapped vault. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an Amazon EFS File System is not in a logically air-gapped vault within the specified time period.

Name: Checks if Amazon EKS Runtime Monitoring with automated agent management is enabled for GuardDuty detector in your account
Description: Checks if Amazon EKS Runtime Monitoring with automated agent management is enabled for GuardDuty detector in your account. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if EKS Runtime Monitoring with automated agent management in GuardDuty is not enabled for your account.

Name: Require an Amazon Neptune DB cluster to set a backup retention period greater than or equal to seven days
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Neptune DB clusters have configured automatic backups with a retention period set to 7 or more days (>=7). The default retention period is one day.

Name: Require that the organization's AWS Secrets Manager resources are accessible only by IAM principals that belong to the organization or by an AWS service
Description: This control disallows AWS Secrets Manager API operations for your organization's AWS Secrets Manager resources by an AWS IAM principal, when the principal is outside of the organization and is not an AWS service principal.

Name: Disallow modification of a tag that AWS Control Tower applies to AWS Backup resources
Description: This control limits changes to tags that AWS Control Tower applies to AWS Backup resources.

Name: Require that an attached Amazon EBS volume is configured to encrypt data at rest
Description: This control disallows attaching an unencrypted EBS volume to a running or stopped EC2 instance.

Name: Require that point-in-time recovery for an Amazon DynamoDB table is activated
Description: This control checks whether point-in-time recovery (PITR) is enabled for an Amazon DynamoDB table.

Name: Require any AWS Network Firewall firewall policy to drop or forward fragmented packets by default when they do not match a stateless rule
Description: This control checks whether an AWS Network Firewall firewall policy is configured with a default action to drop or forward fragmented packets, when the packets do not match a stateless rule.

Name: Checks if an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption at rest enabled
Description: Checks if an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption at rest enabled. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'AtRestEncryptionEnabled' is false.

Name: Checks if the S3 bucket configurations for your AWS CloudTrail logs have Amazon S3 server access logging enabled
Description: Checks if the S3 bucket configurations for your AWS CloudTrail logs have Amazon S3 server access logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if at least one S3 bucket for a CloudTrail trail does not have S3 server access logging enabled.

Name: Neptune DB cluster snapshots should not be public
Description: This control checks whether a Neptune manual DB cluster snapshot is public. The control fails if a Neptune manual DB cluster snapshot is public.

Name: Require Amazon ECS task definitions to have secure networking modes and user definitions
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) task definitions that use 'host' networking mode have a privileged container definition, and whether they specify a non-root user definition.

Name: Attached EBS volumes should be encrypted at-rest
Description: This AWS control checks whether the EBS volumes that are in an attached state are encrypted.

Name: Require an Amazon EBS snapshot to be created from an encrypted EC2 volume
Description: This control disallows creation of new snapshots that are based on unencrypted EBS volumes.

Name: Checks if AWS App Mesh virtual routers have tags
Description: Checks if AWS App Mesh virtual routers have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Require an Elasticsearch domain to be created in a user-specified Amazon VPC
Description: This control checks whether Elasticsearch domains are configured with VPC option settings that specify a target Amazon VPC.

Name: Detect whether an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance allows direct internet access
Description: Detects whether direct internet access is allowed for an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if Amazon SageMaker notebook instances allow direct internet access.

Name: Checks if Amazon CloudFront distributions are using a minimum security policy and cipher suite of TLSv1
Description: Checks if Amazon CloudFront distributions are using a minimum security policy and cipher suite of TLSv1.2 or greater for viewer connections. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a CloudFront distribution if the minimumProtocolVersion is below TLSv1.2_2018.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 instance to specify at most one network interface by means of the NetworkInterfaces property in the AWS::EC2::Instance resource
Description: This control checks whether an AWS::EC2::Instance resource specifies multiple ENIs (Elastic Network Interfaces) in the NetworkInterfaces property.

Name: Enable access logging for log archive
Description: Track log archive access requests using S3 bucket access logging.

Name: Elastic Beanstalk environments should have enhanced health reporting enabled
Description: This control checks whether enhanced health reporting is enabled for your AWS Elastic Beanstalk environments.

Name: Connections to Amazon Redshift clusters should be encrypted in transit
Description: This control checks whether connections to Amazon Redshift clusters are required to use encryption in transit. The check fails if the Amazon Redshift cluster parameter require_SSL is not set to 1.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group to have EC2 launch templates configured
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group is configured to use an EC2 launch template.

Name: Checks if SNS topics are encrypted with AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS)
Description: Checks if SNS topics are encrypted with AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an SNS topic is not encrypted with AWS KMS. Optionally, specify the key ARNs, the alias ARNs, the alias name, or the key IDs for the rule to check.

Name: Require an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain to have zone awareness and at least three data nodes
Description: This control checks whether Amazon OpenSearch Service domains are configured with at least three data nodes and zone awareness enabled.

Name: The default stateless action for Network Firewall policies should be drop or forward for fragmented packets
Description: This control checks whether a Network Firewall policy has drop or forward as the default stateless action for fragmented packets. The control passes if Drop or Forward is selected, and fails if Pass is selected.

Name: Checks if DNS resolution from accepter/requester VPC to private IP is enabled
Description: Checks if DNS resolution from accepter/requester VPC to private IP is enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if DNS resolution from accepter/requester VPC to private IP is not enabled.

Name: Both VPN tunnels for an AWS Site-to-Site VPN connection should be up
Description: This control checks that both VPN tunnels provided by AWS Site-to-Site VPN are in UP status. The control fails if one or both tunnels are in DOWN status.

Name: Checks if a recovery point was created for AWS Backup-Gateway VirtualMachines
Description: Checks if a recovery point was created for AWS Backup-Gateway VirtualMachines. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an AWS Backup-Gateway VirtualMachines does not have a corresponding recovery point created within the specified time period.

Name: Checks if an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption at rest enabled
Description: Checks if an AWS AppSync API cache has encryption at rest enabled. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'AtRestEncryptionEnabled' is false.

Name: Require an AWS Elastic Beanstalk environment to have a logging configuration
Description: This control checks whether an AWS Elastic Beanstalk environment is configured to send logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Name: Checks if Amazon Fraud Detector outcomes have tags
Description: Checks if Amazon Fraud Detector outcomes have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule.  The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Detect whether the AWS Lambda function policy attached to the Lambda resource blocks public access
Description: Detects whether the AWS Lambda function policy attached to the Lambda resource prohibits public access. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Lambda function policy allows public access.

Name: Require any Amazon CloudFront distribution to have logging enabled
Description: This control checks whether Amazon CloudFront distributions are configured with access logging.

Name: Detect whether versioning for Amazon S3 buckets is enabled
Description: Protect your Amazon S3 buckets by detecting whether versioning is enabled. Versioning allows you to recover objects from accidental deletion or overwrite.

Name: Require encryption on all Amazon S3 logs for AWS CodeBuild projects
Description: This control checks whether AWS CodeBuild projects configured with Amazon S3 logs have encryption enabled.

Name: Require that an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group launch configuration does not have Amazon EC2 instances with public IP addresses
Description: This control checks whether Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling groups have public IP addresses configured through launch configurations.

Name: Checks whether detailed monitoring is enabled for EC2 instances
Description: Checks whether detailed monitoring is enabled for EC2 instances.

Name: Require that Amazon ECS task definitions do not pass secrets as container environment variables
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) task definition container definitions include environment variables named 'AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID', 'AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY', or 'ECS_ENGINE_AUTH_DATA'.

Name: IAM users' access keys should be rotated every 90 days or less
Description: This AWS control checks whether the active access keys are rotated within 90 days.

Name: Neptune DB clusters should be configured to copy tags to snapshots
Description: This control checks whether a Neptune DB cluster is configured to copy tags to snapshots when the snapshots are created. The control fails if a Neptune DB cluster isn't configured to copy tags to snapshots.

Name: Require any Amazon RDS instance to have deletion protection configured
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) instance has deletion protection activated.

Name: Checks if an Amazon PostgreSQL DB instance is configured to publish logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs
Description: Checks if an Amazon PostgreSQL DB instance is configured to publish logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the DB instance is not configured to publish logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Name: API Gateway REST API stages should be configured to use SSL certificates for backend authentication
Description: This control checks whether Amazon API Gateway REST API stages have SSL certificates configured that backend systems can use to authenticate that incoming requests are from the API Gateway.

Name: Require an EC2 instance to use an AWS Nitro instance type that supports encryption in-transit between instances when created using the AWS::EC2::Instance resource type
Description: This control checks whether an EC2 instance has been configured to run using a Nitro instance type that supports encryption in-transit between instances.

Name: Detect whether storage encryption is enabled for Amazon RDS database instances
Description: Detect Amazon RDS database instances that are not encrypting their underlying storage.

Name: Disallow the use of deprecated Amazon EC2 RequestSpotFleet and RequestSpotInstances API actions
Description: This control disallows usage of EC2 'RequestSpotFleet' and 'RequestSpotInstances' APIs, because they are legacy APIs with no planned investment.

Name: Checks if automatic minor version upgrades are enabled for Amazon MQ brokers
Description: Checks if automatic minor version upgrades are enabled for Amazon MQ brokers. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the 'AutoMinorVersionUpgrade' field is not enabled for an Amazon MQ broker.

Name: Checks if cross-zone load balancing is enabled on Network Load Balancers (NLBs)
Description: Checks if cross-zone load balancing is enabled on Network Load Balancers (NLBs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if cross-zone load balancing is not enabled for an NLB.

Name: Require Amazon ECR private repositories to have image scanning enabled
Description: This control checks whether a private Amazon ECR repository has image scanning enabled.

Name: Checks if an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) cluster is configured with logging enabled
Description: Checks if an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) cluster is configured with logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging for Amazon EKS clusters is not enabled for all log types.

Name: IAM authentication should be configured for RDS instances
Description: This control checks whether an RDS DB instance has IAM database authentication enabled.

Name: Require that the organization's AWS Security Token Service resources are accessible only by IAM principals that belong to the organization, or by an AWS service
Description: This control disallows select AWS Security Token Service (STS) API operations by an AWS IAM principal for your organization's AWS Security Token Service resources, when the principal is outside of the organization and is not an AWS service principal.

Name: Require an active Amazon ECS task definition to have a logging configuration
Description: This control checks whether Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) task definitions have a logging configuration specified.

Name: Checks if a backup vault has an attached resource-based policy which prevents deletion of recovery points
Description: Checks if a backup vault has an attached resource-based policy which prevents deletion of recovery points. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Backup Vault does not have resource-based policies or has policies without a suitable 'Deny' statement.

Name: Checks if an Amazon WorkSpace volume has the root volume encryption settings set to enabled
Description: Checks if an Amazon WorkSpace volume has the root volume encryption settings set to enabled. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the encryption setting is not enabled for the root volume.

Name: Checks if AWS Step Functions machine has logging enabled
Description: Checks if AWS Step Functions machine has logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a state machine does not have logging enabled or the logging configuration is not at the minimum level provided.

Name: Checks if AWS AppConfig extension associations have tags
Description: Checks if AWS AppConfig extension associations have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Require any Amazon EC2 network ACL to prevent ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22 or port 3389
Description: This control checks whether the Amazon EC2 network ACL inbound entry allows unrestricted incoming traffic ('0.0.0.0/0' or '::/0') for SSH or RDP.

Name: EventBridge custom event buses should have a resource-based policy attached
Description: This control checks if an Amazon EventBridge custom event bus has a resource policy attached. This control fails if the custom event bus doesn't have a resource policy.

Name: Checks if an AWS DataSync task has Amazon CloudWatch logging enabled
Description: Checks if an AWS DataSync task has Amazon CloudWatch logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an AWS DataSync task does not have Amazon CloudWatch logging enabled or if the logging level is not equivalent to the logging level that you specify.

Name: Checks if AWS IoT SiteWise projects have tags
Description: Checks if AWS IoT SiteWise projects have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Checks if an AWS AppSync API has logging enabled
Description: Checks if an AWS AppSync API has logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging is not enabled, or if the field logging levels for the AWS AppSync API do not match the values specified in the 'fieldLoggingLevel' rule parameter.

Name: Require an Amazon Redshift cluster to have a unique administrator username
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Redshift cluster has changed the administrator username from its default value.

Name: Checks if AWS AppConfig environments have tags
Description: Checks if AWS AppConfig environments have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule to check. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: An RDS event notifications subscription should be configured for critical database instance events
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon RDS Event subscription for RDS instances is configured to notify on event categories of both "maintenance", "configuration change", and "failure".

Name: Database Migration Service replication instances should not be public
Description: This AWS control checks whether AWS Database Migration Service replication instances are public by examining the PubliclyAccessible field value.

Name: Detect whether MFA is enabled for AWS IAM users
Description: Detect whether multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for any AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user. MFA requires an additional authentication code after the user name and password are successful.

Name: Require an Amazon EC2 instance to use an AWS Nitro instance type when created using the 'AWS::EC2::Instance' resource type
Description: This control checks whether an EC2 instance is configured to run using an AWS Nitro instance type.

Name: Checks if Application Load Balancers and Network Load Balancers are configured to use certificates from Amazon Certificate Manager (ACM)
Description: Checks if Application Load Balancers and Network Load Balancers are configured to use certificates from Amazon Certificate Manager (ACM). This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if at least 1 load balancer is configured without a certificate from ACM.

Name: Detect whether MFA is enabled for AWS IAM users of the AWS Console
Description: Detect whether multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for any AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user using the console. MFA requires an additional authentication code after the user name and password are successful.

Name: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3)
Description: Checks if a recovery point was created for Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Amazon S3 bucket does not have a corresponding recovery point created within the specified time period.

Name: CloudTrail trails should be integrated with Amazon CloudWatch Logs
Description: This AWS control checks whether AWS CloudTrail trails are configured to send logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Name: Application load balancer should be configured to drop http headers
Description: This control evaluates AWS Application Load Balancers (ALB) to ensure they are configured to drop http headers. By default, ALBs are not configured to drop invalid http header values. This control evaluates all ALBs fails if the attribute value of routing.http.drop_invalid_header_fields.enabled is set to false.

Name: Checks if AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key is configured for an Amazon SageMaker endpoint configuration
Description: Checks if AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key is configured for an Amazon SageMaker endpoint configuration. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'KmsKeyId' is not specified for the Amazon SageMaker endpoint configuration.

Name: Checks that there is at least one AWS CloudTrail trail defined with security best practices
Description: Checks that there is at least one AWS CloudTrail trail defined with security best practices.

Name: Require any AWS Network Firewall rule group to contain at least one rule
Description: This control checks whether an AWS Network Firewall stateless rule group contains rules.

Name: Require a Network Load Balancer to have cross-zone load balancing activated
Description: This control checks whether a Network Load Balancer (NLB) is configured with cross-zone load balancing.

Name: Require an Elasticsearch Service domain to use a minimum TLS version of TLSv1.2
Description: This control checks whether Elasticsearch Service domains are configured to require HTTPS with a minimum TLS version of TLSv1.2.

Name: Checks if Amazon ElastiCache for Redis clusters have auto minor version upgrades enabled
Description: Checks if Amazon ElastiCache for Redis clusters have auto minor version upgrades enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an ElastiCache cluster if it is using the Redis engine and 'AutoMinorVersionUpgrade' is not set to 'true'.

Name: IAM users should not have IAM policies attached
Description: This AWS control checks that none of your IAM users have policies attached. Instead, IAM users must inherit permissions from IAM groups or roles.

Name: Checks if an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database cluster has changed the admin username from its default value
Description: Checks if an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database cluster has changed the admin username from its default value. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the admin username is set to the default value.

Name: Checks if Audit Log Monitoring for Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) is enabled for an Amazon GuardDuty detector in your account
Description: Checks if Audit Log Monitoring for Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) is enabled for an Amazon GuardDuty detector in your account. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the EKS Audit Log Monitoring feature is not enabled for your account.

Name: API Gateway routes should specify an authorization type
Description: This control checks if Amazon API Gateway routes have an authorization type. The control fails if the API Gateway route does not specify an authorization type

Name: Detect whether any Amazon VPC subnets are assigned a public IP address
Description: Detects whether Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) subnets are assigned a public IP address. The rule is COMPLIANT if Amazon VPC does not have subnets that are assigned a public IP address. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if Amazon VPC has subnets that are assigned a public IP address.

Name: Require an Amazon Athena workgroup to encrypt Athena query results at rest with an AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Athena workgroup is configured to encrypt query results at rest with an AWS KMS key.

Name: Require any AWS Network Firewall firewall policy to drop or forward stateless full packets by default when they do not match a rule
Description: This control checks whether an AWS Network Firewall firewall policy is configured with a user-defined stateless default action for full packets.

Name: Checks if Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes are in a logically air-gapped vault
Description: Checks if Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes are in a logically air-gapped vault. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an Amazon EBS volume is not in a logically air-gapped vault within the specified time period.

Name: Require that Amazon S3 buckets request to use Secure Socket Layer
Description: This control checks whether Amazon S3 bucket policies require requests to use Secure Socket Layer (SSL).

Name: Detect whether public access to Amazon RDS database snapshots is enabled
Description: Secure your Amazon RDS database snapshots by detecting whether public access is enabled.

Name: Require that the organization's Amazon SQS resources are accessible only by IAM principals that belong to the organization, or by an AWS service
Description: This control disallows Amazon SQS API operations for your organization's Amazon SQS resources by an AWS IAM principal, when the principal is outside of the organization and is not an AWS service principal.

Name: Checks if logConfiguration is set on active ECS Task Definitions
Description: Checks if logConfiguration is set on active ECS Task Definitions. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an active ECSTaskDefinition does not have the logConfiguration resource defined or the value for logConfiguration is null in at least one container definition.

Name: Checks if Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery streams are encrypted at rest with server-side encryption
Description: Checks if Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery streams are encrypted at rest with server-side encryption. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream is not encrypted at rest with server-side encryption.

Name: Rule checks whether AWS account is part of AWS Organizations
Description: Rule checks whether AWS account is part of AWS Organizations. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the AWS account is not part of AWS Organizations or AWS Organizations master account ID does not match rule parameter MasterAccountId.

Name: Require any AWS CodeBuild project environment variable to encrypt credentials in environment variables
Description: This control checks whether AWS CodeBuild projects contain environment variables 'AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID' and 'AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY' stored as 'PLAINTEXT'.

Name: Detect whether public routes exist in the route table for an Internet Gateway (IGW)
Description: Detects whether public routes exist in the route table associated with an Internet Gateway (IGW). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a route has a destination CIDR block of '0.0.0.0/0' or '::/0' or if a destination CIDR block does not match the rule parameter.

Name: Checks if all methods in Amazon API Gateway stages have cache enabled and cache encrypted
Description: Checks if all methods in Amazon API Gateway stages have cache enabled and cache encrypted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any method in an Amazon API Gateway stage is not configured to cache or the cache is not encrypted.

Name: Require an Amazon DAX cluster to encrypt data in transit with Transport Layer Security (TLS)
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon DAX cluster endpoint is configured to encrypt data in transit with Transport Layer Security (TLS).

Name: Require an Elasticsearch domain to send error logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs
Description: This control checks whether Elasticsearch domains are configured to send error logs to an Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group.

Name: Checks if Amazon Fraud Detector labels have tags
Description: Checks if Amazon Fraud Detector labels have tags. Optionally, you can specify tag keys for the rule. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no tags or if the specified tag keys are not present. The rule does not check for tags starting with 'aws:'.

Name: Checks if the currently set default version of an Amazon EC2 Launch Template requires new launched instances to use V2 of the Amazon EC2 Instance Metadata Service (IMDSv2)
Description: Checks if the currently set default version of an Amazon EC2 Launch Template requires new launched instances to use V2 of the Amazon EC2 Instance Metadata Service (IMDSv2). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'Metadata version' is not specified as V2 (IMDSv2).

Name: Require that an Amazon S3 bucket does not manage user access with an access control list (ACL)
Description: This control checks whether your Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket allows user permissions through access control lists.

Name: Require an Amazon Neptune DB cluster to have storage encryption enabled
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Neptune cluster has storage encryption enabled.

Name: Elasticsearch domains should be in a VPC
Description: This control checks whether Elasticsearch domains are in a VPC. It does not evaluate the VPC subnet routing configuration to determine public reachability. This AWS control also does not check whether the Amazon OpenSearch Service resource-based policy permits public access by other accounts or external entities. You should ensure that Elasticsearch domains are not attached to public subnets. See Resource-based policies (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticsearch-service/latest/developerguide/es-ac.html#es-ac-types-resource) in the Amazon OpenSearch Service (successor to Amazon Elasticsearch Service) Developer Guide. You should also ensure that your VPC is configured according to the recommended best practices. See Security best practices for your VPC (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/vpc-security-best-practices.html) in the Amazon VPC User Guide.

Name: S3 access control lists (ACLs) should not be used to manage user access to buckets
Description: This control checks if S3 buckets allow user permissions via access control lists (ACLs). This control fails if ACLs are configured for user access on S3 Bucket.

Name: Checks if an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) cluster has deletion protection enabled
Description: Checks if an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) cluster has deletion protection enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an Amazon RDS cluster does not have deletion protection enabled.

Name: Checks if an Amazon S3 access point does not allow access from the internet (NetworkOrigin is VPC)
Description: Checks if an Amazon S3 access point does not allow access from the internet (NetworkOrigin is VPC). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if NetworkOrigin is Internet.

Name: Checks if internet gateways are attached to an authorized virtual private cloud (Amazon VPC)
Description: Checks if internet gateways are attached to an authorized virtual private cloud (Amazon VPC). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if internet gateways are attached to an unauthorized VPC.

Name: Disallow modification of an AWS IAM role that AWS Control Tower utilizes to manage AWS Backup resources
Description: This control limits modification of the AWS IAM role (aws-controltower-BackupRole) that AWS Control Tower utilizes for management of AWS Backup resources.

Name: Require an Amazon Neptune DB cluster to have AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) database authentication enabled
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Neptune cluster has AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) database authentication enabled.

Name: MSK clusters should be encrypted in transit among broker nodes
Description: This controls checks if a MSK cluster allows encryption in transit using HTTPS(TLS) among the broker nodes of the cluster. The control fails if plain text communication is enabled for in cluster broker node connection.

Name: Require an AWS CloudTrail trail to have an Amazon CloudWatch log group configuration
Description: This control checks whether your AWS CloudTrail trail is configured to send logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Name: Require an Amazon Redshift cluster to have enhanced VPC routing
Description: This control checks whether an Amazon Redshift cluster has enhanced VPC routing configured.
